comments.body: I also noticed that I did not uninstall providers here. It had no final effect before release (becuase it instlled rc1s first and then overwrote the installations with 1.0.0 versions built locally, but it is cleaner to remove the providers here

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +54,58 @@    uninstall_airflow_and_providers
    install_airflow_from_wheel "[all]"
    uninstall_providers
elif [[ ${INSTALL_AIRFLOW_VERSION} == "sdist"  ]]; then
    echo
